What does FDISK do?
question.option_1: Performs low-level formatting of the hard drive
question.option_2: Fixes bad sectors on the hard drive
question.option_3: Recovers lost clusters on the hard drive
question.option_4: Creates partitions on the hard drive
question.answer: Creates partitions on the hard drive

question.option_1: They are identical except for their shape

question.option_3: AT power supplies run on 120V AC current while ATX uses 220V AC
question.option_4: AT supplies use P8 and P9 power connectors while ATX uses a single P1 connector
question.answer: AT supplies use P8 and P9 power connectors while ATX uses a single P1 connector

JAVA: The use of protected keyword to a member in a class will restrict its visibility as follows:
question.option_1: Visible in all classes in the same package and subclasses in other packages
question.option_2: Visible only in the class where it is declared
question.option_3: Visible only in the class and its subclass in the same package
question.answer: Visible in all classes in the same package and subclasses in other packages
